# FPGA Ethernet

![HDL](https://img.shields.io/badge/HDL-SystemVerilog-7177bd?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
![Toolchain](https://img.shields.io/badge/Quartus-Quartus?logo=intel&logoColor=white&label=Toolchain&labelColor=grey&color=%233995e6)
![FPGA](https://img.shields.io/badge/Cyclone%20IV-Cyclone%20IV?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&label=FPGA&labelColor=grey&color=%231e2033)
![Protocol](https://img.shields.io/badge/Protocol-IPv4%20%26%20UDP-08196e?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIGZpbGw9IiNmZmZmZmYiIHdpZHRoPSI4MDBweCIgaGVpZ2h0PSI4MDBweCIgdmlld0JveD0iMCAwIDI0IDI0Ij48cGF0aCBkPSJNNi45OSAxMUwzIDE1bDMuOTkgNHYtM0gxNHYtMkg2Ljk5di0zek0yMSA5bC0zLjk5LTR2M0gxMHYyaDcuMDF2M0wyMSA5eiIvPjwvc3ZnPg==)

**A SystemVerilog implementation of a 100Base-TX Ethernet receiver, featuring a custom RMII interface and hardware-based UDP/IPv4 packet parsing.**
